p: Detailed data preparation, analysis and interpretation were provided by the kits’ manufacturer (Cayman’s COX inhibitor screening assay kit, item no. 560,131). In brief, the 96-well microtitre plate was set up to include two blank wells (blk), two non-specific binding wells (NSB), two maximum binding (B 0) wells, one total activity (TA) well, eights wells for varying concentrations of standards run in duplicates, one background (BC) well for each COX, one 100% initial activity (IA) well for each COX and the remaining wells for varying concentrations of COX-inhibitor samples. The 96-well sample plate map is presented in Figure 4.
